title: Seismic adds $10 million from a16z crypto to expand fintech privacy network
contentSnippet: Seismic, whose total funding now sits at $17 million, says fintech demand for crypto rails is rising, but privacy gaps still deter adoption.

title: Hyperliquid pauses deposits and withdrawals amid POPCAT trading scheme speculation
contentSnippet: An onchain analyst speculated Hyperliquid paused transactions after a trader tried to prop up the price of memecoin POPCAT.

title: Solana Drops 4.9% Breaking Below Key Support as Alameda Unlocks Continue
contentSnippet: Institutional inflows of $336 million fail to offset selling pressure as SOL falls to $153 amid fresh token releases.

title: Bitcoin Plunges Below $102K Amid Weak U.S. Demand, Fed Divided on December Cut
contentSnippet: Bitcoin's Coinbase Premium, a popular gauge for U.S. demand, is having its longest negative streak since the April correction, coinciding with the Fed turning more hawkish.

title: Stellar's XLM Trades in Tight Range as Traders Exhibit Uncertainty
contentSnippet: XLM trades within tight $0.2810-$0.2950 corridor following volume surge that triggered key support breakdown earlier in session.

title: HBAR Drops 0.6% to $0.18 Amid Indecisive Trading Session
contentSnippet: Hedera's native token breaks key support in final trading hour as institutional focus shifts to regulatory-friendly blockchain alternatives.

title: BONK Falls 5% to $0.00001223 After Rejection at Key Resistance
contentSnippet: BONK slipped 5% to $0.00001223 after failing to break resistance near $0.0000130, with trading volume spiking nearly 50% above average during the pullback.

title: Sui Launches Native Stablecoin USDsui Using Bridge’s Open Issuance Platform
contentSnippet: The new U.S.-compliant USDsui aims to link the blockchain’s $200bn monthly stablecoin volume to Bridge’s interoperable platform.

title: DOJ, FBI, Secret Service Unveil 'Strike Force' to Combat Crypto Scams Rooted in China
contentSnippet: The Scam Center Strike Force will coordinate across federal agencies to target crypto scam operations the DOJ said lead back to “Chinese crime syndicates.”

title: Toncoin Drops 2.4% as Post-Rally Selling Pressure Caps Gains
contentSnippet: The token briefly rallied to $2.1165 on increased volume before heavy selling erased gains, pulling TON back to key support levels around $2.02.

title: Coinbase to Leave Delaware for Bitcoin-Friendly Texas
contentSnippet: America's largest crypto exchange chooses the Lone Star State for its business-friendly regulation.

title: Brazil Proposes Selling Seized Bitcoin to Undercut Organized Crime Networks
contentSnippet: The proposed law, part of the "anti-faction bill", would treat cryptocurrencies like foreign currencies and financial securities.

title: New Strike Force Set to Target Overseas 'Pig Butchering' as U.S. Hits Burma Operation
contentSnippet: U.S. federal agencies are establishing a Scam Center Strike Force to counter the industrial-scale efforts to swindle money via crypto transactions.

title: Crypto Rebounds! Lighter $1.5B Valuation! Winklevoss Capital fund Zcash DAT!
contentSnippet: Crypto majors are rebounding after Tuesday’s selloff, with Bitcoin (BTC) up 1% at $105,000, while Ethereum (ETH) remains even at $3,550, Binance Coin (BNB) steady at $978, and Solana (SOL) down 2% at

title: The Protocol: Sweeping Uniswap Proposal ‘UNIfication’
contentSnippet: Also: Monad Tokenomics Unveiled, Anchorage Dabbles in BTC DeFi and Injective’s Native EVM.

title: Bitdeer's New Bitcoin Mining Facility in Ohio Caught on Fire
contentSnippet: A fire affected two buildings belonging to publicly traded Bitcoin miner Bitdeer in Massillon, Ohio on Tuesday.

title: Polymarket becomes Yahoo Finance’s exclusive prediction market partner, eyes another record month
contentSnippet: The news comes a week after Google said it will integrate predictions data from Polymarket and Kalshi directly into its search results.

title: Winklevoss-backed Cypherpunk targets 5% of Zcash supply with $58 million treasury seed
contentSnippet: Winklevoss cast Zcash as a "privacy hedge" to bitcoin, part of a comeback narrative for privacy coins in 2025.

title: SEC Chair Paul Atkins unveils plan for ‘token taxonomy’ to redefine crypto regulation
contentSnippet: SEC Chair Atkins is spearheading an effort to create a "token taxonomy" that looks to delineate between what crypto would be securities

title: SEC Chair Paul Atkins Reveals Which Crypto Tokens He Thinks Are Securities
contentSnippet: In a speech Wednesday, Atkins gave his most explicit reasoning yet as to why most of the crypto industry should not be regulated by the SEC.

title: Sui launching USDsui stablecoin via Bridge amid growing adoption
contentSnippet: The stablecoin is meant to comply with the GENIUS Act, the U.S. government's framework for stablecoins passed this year.

title: Visa Pilots USDC Payouts for Creators and Gig Workers
contentSnippet: Visa expects the scheme, earmarked for creators and gig economy workers, to roll out to the public at some time in 2026.

title: Crypto’s ‘yield gap’ is closing fast as stablecoins and tokenized assets surge: RedStone
contentSnippet: RedStone's latest report predicts that yield-bearing stablecoins, staking products, and tokenized assets will grow under the GENIUS Act.

title: Auradine unveils new Teraflux bitcoin mining ASICs, claiming 9.8 J/TH efficiency
contentSnippet: The lineup spans air, hydro, and immersion models and is designed to cut power costs and improve fleet uptime for large operators.

title: Corporate Bitcoin Buying Slows as Total Holdings Reach Record High
contentSnippet: Companies are increasingly focused on defending existing positions rather than headline-grabbing buys as they navigate weaker sentiment.

title: ‘Use this and you’re going to die’ — Kraken co-CEO slams cigarette box-style UK crypto promotion rules as overly restrictive: FT
contentSnippet: The FCA defended its framework, stating that the measures ensure investors understand risks before trading digital assets.

title: Fire breaks out at Bitdeer bitcoin mining facility in Ohio, no injuries reported
contentSnippet: The incident came as Bitdeer's shares fell more than 30% following its third-quarter earnings release on Tuesday.

title: Franklin Templeton Expands Tokenized Fund Platform to Canton Network
contentSnippet: The asset manager’s Benji platform will now operate on Canton, a blockchain used for institutional settlement and collateral markets.

title: Morning Minute: SoFi Bank Launches Spot Crypto Trading
contentSnippet: It's a major first for banks and fintechs as access to crypto trading becomes easier and easier.

title: Crypto Markets In Short-Term Reprieve, Risks Remain: QCP
contentSnippet: Analysts say crypto's recent rebound is a short-term reprieve, with markets facing volatility from shutdown politics and key inflation data.
